titles.title: A resolution honoring the life of Michael P. Smith.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 10/1/2008--Introduced. Honors the life of Michael P. Smith, an award-winning photographer nationally recognized for his work. Recognizes Michael P. Smith for his contributions as a cultural archivist of New Orleans and Louisiana history and culture. Extends condolences to his family on his death.
